1GARD International Marketing Network

Integrated 1GARD Marketing Technology

 

The technology of 1GARD International Access Program (1GARD program) is based on exchange between holder of 1GARD Access Card or Card (Cardholder) and Company-Member of 1GARD 's International Access Program (1GARD Member) . 1GARD Processing Center makes this exchange possible. Cardholder places anonymous information such as age, country residence, place of birth, professional occupation, income and other required info of one's own free will at 1GARD Processing Center's disposal and receives Money-Saving opportunity instead (1GARD Access Card account). The 1GARD Member realize Money-Saving opportunity by providing discount on products or services (1GARD discount) to Cardholder and receives unique marketing statistics and the marketing reports from 1GARD Processing Center instead. Verifications of the Account (Card) initiate the transactions and statistical records. The transactions and the statistical records combined with anonymous information of Account (card) holders are the base of the marketing statistics and the marketing reports.
We have named all these compilations "1GARD Marketing Technology".
